root.name: Black Crypt
root.description: OverviewBlack Crypt is a role-playing game developed by Raven Software and published by Electronic Arts for the Amiga platforms.Black Crypt was the game that introduced Raven Software. It's a role playing game that was later ported to PC. Players take a group of four and fight their way through dungeons.

similar_games.game: Eye of the Beholder II: The Legend of Darkmoon
